name: Drive Off - Car Chase Game
description:
Drive Off is free-to-play car chase game. Engage in action-packed chase behind wheels of minicar. Drift to outrun the cops and avoid obstacles. Drive with style with various car models you prefer best for chase.

With super simple mechanics and two button controls. No extra settings to mess with, no fuzzy tutorial, jump directly into the chase.

- Simple Control
- No time wasting tutorial - Jump right into the action
- Choose among various Car Models
- Ads which double your credits

Fasten your seatbelt and be ready to test your driving skills!

JOIN & SUPPORT ME
